law.catch_line: Return of payments and notes of indebtedness.
law.text: Within ten (10) days after a sale of interest has been canceled or an offer to purchase revoked, the subdivider shall tender to the buyer any payments made by the buyer and any note or other evidence of indebtedness.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 194, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1988.
